cd:Time.cd:Description: Date and time of first measurement used for this L2B or L2C product

cd:Record.cd:Description: Structure containing the calibration values and algorithm parameters as used by the Mie wind retrievalFitting_ValFlag algorithm.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: If set to True then a fixed value was used for the peak position for the internal reference wind by the Mie processing algorithm. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Float.cd:Description: In case Enforce_Fixed_IntRef_PeakPos is set to true, then this value will be used to fill the peak position for the internal reference wind by the Mie processing algorithm. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: In case Enforce_Fixed_IntRef_PeakPos is set to true, then this value will be used to fill the peak position for the internal reference wind by the Mie processing algorithm. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Float.cd:Description: Slope to use to calculate the internal reference Mie wind in case Override_Slope_Intercept_IntRef is set to True. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.
Intercept to use to calculate the internal reference Mie wind in case Override_Slope_Intercept_IntRef is set to True. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: actual source was for the above defined Mie_Slope_IntRef and Mie_Intercept_IntRef values.

If set to True then the slope and intercept to calculate the atmospheric path Mie wind will be taken from the AUX_PAR_2B file in stead of from the L1B product. Note that the values from the optional AUX_MRC_1B input file will take priority in case that one is used. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Float.cd:Description: Intercept to use to calculate the atmospheric path Mie wind in case Override_Slope_Intercept_AtmPath is set to True. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.
Intercept to use to calculate the atmospheric path Mie wind in case Override_Slope_Intercept_AtmPath is set to True. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: This parameter describes what the actual source was for the above defined Mie_Slope_AtmPath and Mie_Intercept_AtmPath values.

If set to True then the L2BP will use the fitted Mie nonlinear correction table from the L1B product in stead of the regular table. This fitted table is defined in the AUX_PAR_1B file as used by the L1B processor. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file

If set to True then the L2BP will use the NWP based Mie nonlinear correction table as defined in the AUX_PAR_2B file for the internal reference calculation.. This overrides the values given in the L1B product. But note that using the optional AUX_MRC_1B input file for the L2BP has priority and will in turn override this current setting. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Array.cd:Description: An array of values defining the pixel positions on which the Mie nonlinear correction for the internal reference is defined. This array has length NumFreqIntRef which value is defined in the SPH header
An array of values defining the Mie nonlinear correction for the internal reference. This array has length NumFreqIntRef which value is defined in the SPH header

cd:Integer.cd:Description: This parameter describes what the actual source was for the above defined Pixel_Position_IntRef and Fitted_Mie_NL_Corr_IntRef values.

If set to True then the L2BP will use the NWP based Mie nonlinear correction table as defined in the AUX_PAR_2B file for the atmospheric path calculation. This overrides the values given in the L1B product. But note that using the optional AUX_MRC_1B input file for the L2BP has priority and will in turn override this current setting.

cd:Array.cd:Description: An array of values defining the pixel positions on which the Mie nonlinear correction for the atmospheric path is defined. This array has length NumFreqAtmPath which value is defined in the SPH header
An array of values defining the Mie nonlinear correction for the atmospheric path. This array has length NumFreqAtmPath which value is defined in the SPH header

cd:Integer.cd:Description: This parameter describes what the actual source was for the above defined Pixel_Position_AtmPath and Fitted_Mie_NL_Corr_AtmPath values.

cd:Record.cd:Description: Structure containing the calibration values and algorithm parameters as used by the Rayleigh wind retrieval algorithm

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Method for calculating the reference Rayleigh response. This value is copied from the AUX_PAR_2B file.

cd:Float.cd:Description: Constant value used to define the reference Rayleigh Response in case the RR_Ref_Method is set to RR_Ref_Fixed_Method
Offset value used to calculate the reference Rayleigh response value based on the observed Mie response frequency in case the RR_Ref_Method is set to RR_Ref_from_MieEmitFreq_Method
Slope value used to calculate the reference Rayleigh response value based on the observed Mie response frequency in case the RR_Ref_Method is set to RR_Ref_from_MieEmitFreq_Method
